data.title: Paintings of the Glass Bucket Club and Edna Manley Jamaica
data.meta_description: Jamaican Genealogy Glass Bucket Club and Edna Manley
data.text:
Jamaican Family Search Genealogy Research Library

PAINTINGS BY Arnold Paul Von der Porten

These were painted some time in the 1940s.

The Glass Bucket Club, Kingston, Jamaica

For a photograph of the outside of this Club, see Kingston c1943.

Portrait of Mrs. Edna Manley

(his art teacher)

Edna Manley (nee Swithenbank), a noted artist and sculptress, married Norman Washington Manley in 1921. He was the founder of the PNP, and chief minister of Jamaica 1955-1961. For his genealogy, see Ann Margaret Taylor.
